Package DecksAndPiles

Interface Deck

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProgrammingDeck, ProgrammingDiscardPile, SPAMCardPile, TrojanHorseCardPile, VirusCardPile, WormCardPile
public interface Deck
Author:
Tobias Celik Interface Deck This Interface ensures that all decks implement the same methods
